Parol.definition: an oral declaration or statement [where the evidence of the gift rests in " Matter of Cohn
Parol.origin: [Anglo-French, speech, talk, from Old French parole ]

1.definition: executed or made by word of mouth or by a writing not under seal [a agreement]

2 a.definition: given or expressed by word of mouthoral as distinguished from written

sub_terms.b: relating to matters outside of a writing
